description: Back that thang up. Move that booty. I like big butts. All hail large hind quarters. Have you ever wanted a reverse truck beeper for your well-endowed girlfriend or a portly colleague? Have you ever thought, "Man, I wish I had a reverse beeper right now" as a butt-strong coworker searched the bottom filing cabinet. Perhaps you are the dance floor and some chunky cheese starts backing it up. Wouldn't it be great if you could give her a "Ready for this Jelly" sound track to complete the moment. Now you have your app. Tap screen to put that booty into reverse. Jeff J says, " This app saved my buddy's life. There she was, hovering over the frozen dinner section at Safeway not aware of her surroundings. All of a sudden she was in reverse and the momentum was strong. I whipped out my Pre and we narrowly avoided a messy collision. All thanks to "Back That Thang Up" Good job guys." Michael S says with his witty wordplay. "I have to admit that this is pretty funny." Arman Says, "Hahaha funny app lmfaooo." I am not really sure what that means, but from his five star rating, I am assuming its good. Milton J Says, "This is.......................................................The best app ever created!!!" The polarity of reviews makes me laugh someone else said,"The creator should be shot" Ouch, I did not think that an app cold engender such emotion. Download it now and see for yourself!
